name: Battle Cars Racing
description:
The "Battle Cars Racing" game suggests you to become the participant of amazing auto battles. The main goal of auto battles is to win against enemies in duel at all hazards.
You will be able to buy cars, use earned money, consumables such as nitro & armor, to pump over and improve the parameters of your car.
You will gather experience and to acquire new useful skills, remaining a pile of burning iron after yourself on the tracks that were your rivals before.

Features:
- Next Gen Graphic
- Car's upgrades & tuning
- High detailed muscle cars
- High detailed 4x4 SUV
- High detailed tracks
- Nitro
- Damages physics
- Explosions physics
- Miniguns and cannon guns!

News and bonuses on official page  https://www.facebook.com/pages/Extreme-Games/1531656503724867

Enjoy a new world of battles on cars!
